cn.title: Ethereum（ETH）伦敦升级已完成，转账功能已恢复

message.data: Ethereum（ETH）伦敦升级已完成，目前主网运行稳定，转账功能已恢复。
感谢您对比特派 Bitpie 的支持。

en.title: The Ethereum (ETH) London upgrade has been completed

message.data: The Ethereum (ETH) London upgrade has been completed, the main network is currently operating stably, and the transfer function has been restored.
